Description: Laureate head of Diocletian in imperial mantle, right; holding olive branch & mappa. (obverse)
Providentia standing right, extending right hand to Quies, left; holding branch & leaning on sceptre. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RIC6 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. 6: from Diocletian's reform (AD 294) to the death of Maximinus (AD 313) (57a, p.670) (var.)
